articles.title: Greetings to Senegalese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Senegalese President
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Macky Sall, president of Senegal, on the occasion of the 53rd independence day of the country.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.
					
					 It sincerely wished the Senegalese president bigger success in his responsible work for the country's peace and stability and national unity and socio-economic development.

articles.title: U.S. Chemical Battalion's Redeployment in S. Korea Condemned by CPRK Secretariatã€€
articles.content:
U.S. Chemical Battalion's Redeployment in S. Korea Condemned by CPRK Secretariat
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The 23rd Chemical Battalion of the U.S. Army based in Seattle City, Washington State was recently redeployed in the U.S. Second Division in south Korea.
					 It was reported that an official ceremony in this regard will taken place in Uijongbu, Kyonggi Province on April 4.
					
					 The battalion was stationed in the U.S. military base in Chilgok, North Kyongsang Province as it belonged to the 19th battle area support command of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces till 2004. It was withdrawn to the U.S. mainland. This battalion mercilessly killed many people in the Korean war and other wars. 
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in its information bulletin No. 1028 on Wednesday said that the redeployment of the battalion in south Korea is a revelation of the heinous criminal attempt to inflict nuclear disasters and holocaust of a bio-chemical war on the Korean nation, another unpardonable provocation to the DPRK. The information bulletin went on:
					
					 During the Korean war, the U.S. indiscriminately used germ and chemical weapons against the Korean people, stunning the world.
					
					 The U.S. now seeks to make such crimes against humanity repeat.
					
					 The redeployment of the battalion amounts to an open declaration that it would commit such war crimes again.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are claiming that the redeployment of the battalion is "a defensive one chiefly aimed to keep stability on the Korean Peninsula" and bolster "deterrent of south Korea-U.S. alliance" in a bid to evade accusations at home and abroad.
					
					 But it is sophism to conceal their heinous crime.
					
					 The redeployment of the battalion and attempt to ignite a chemical war go to clearly prove that even though the U.S. vociferates about "prohibition of use of WMDs and prevention of its expansion", it is the U.S. which is wantonly violating them.
					
					 What is intolerable is that the south Korean puppet group of traitors is becoming a dangerous accomplice of the U.S. moves for a chemical war.
					
					 The puppet group is working with bloodshot eyes to inflict even disasters of bio-chemical war on the nation, not content with imposing nuclear disasters by toeing foreign forces in their war moves. It is the group of murderers who cannot live under the same sky, to say nothing of fellow countrymen.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker at the reckless moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet group to ignite a chemical war but wipe them out as it had already declared whether they come in attack with nuclear weapons or with bio-chemical weapons.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group had better stop acting rashly, clearly understanding the will of the army and people of the DPRK to annihilate the enemies in an all-out action.

articles.title: Hostile Forces Should Not Misjudge DPRK's Will to Annihilate Enemies: DFRK Chairman
articles.content:
Hostile Forces Should Not Misjudge DPRK's Will to Annihilate Enemies: DFRK Chairman
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) released a statement on Wednesday.
					 The statement said: I fully support the resolute and patriotic important decision made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the decision adopted at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and will work hard to put them into practice.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean military warmongers' madcap war exercises aimed to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK has entered the practical step, after going beyond the danger line, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The hostile forces should not misjudge the will of the army and people of the DPRK to annihilate enemies.
					
					 We will lose only the Military Demarcation Line and the wall of division from the sacred war of justice and gain national reunification, the lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula and the eternal prosperity of the nation.
					
					 Humankind will clearly see how the Korean people united by dint of justice, truth and patriotism win a great victory and how the U.S., empire of evil, and its stooges meet ruin.
					
					 We strongly call on all the Koreans at home and abroad to turn out as one in the sacred war to bring without fail the bright day of national reunification after sweeping away the harassers of peace, provocateurs of war and confrontation maniacs from this land.  
					
					 We are firmly convinced that world progressive people, political parties, organizations and figures of all countries aspiring after independence against imperialism will pay deep attention to the developments on the Korean Peninsula and extend full support and solidarity to the just sacred war of the Korean nation who turned out in the anti-U.S. resistance to defend the peace and security of the world.

articles.title: Delegation of Youth League Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Youth League Back Home
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League headed by Jong Yong Won, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, returned home on Tuesday after participating in the first international preparatory meeting of the 18th World Festival of Youth and Students held in South Africa. 
					 A delegation of the Mongolian Institute for Strategic Studies headed by N. Dorjsuren arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Delegation of Indian Foreign Ministry Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Indian Foreign Ministry Here
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Indian Foreign Ministry headed by Joint Secretary for East Asia Department Gautam Hemant Bambawale arrived here on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from Mansour Chavoshi, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The ambassador handed them over to an official concerned on Wednesday.

articles.title: Army-People Meetings Held in Nampho, Rason Cities
articles.content:
Army-People Meetings Held in Nampho, Rason Cities
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Army-people meetings took place in Nampho and Rason cities Wednesday to support the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and vow to win victory in the all-people final battle against the aggressors including the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors.
					 Present at the meetings were officials of the local party and power organs and working people's organizations, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and other people of industrial establishments and farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.
					
					 The speakers said the will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to take a thousand-fold revenge on the enemies is running high, following the release of the statement of the KPA Supreme Command and the important decision of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un at an operation meeting on the KPA Strategic Rocket Force's performance of duty on firepower strike.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 We have our own-style means and ways of merciless strike which are unpredictable and still unknown to the world. The high precision strike means of the DPRK are aiming all the big and small military objects of the enemies. 
					
					 The time when words worked has gone. If the U.S. imperialists ignite a war again in this land, they can never evade the shameful defeat, and the army and people of the DPRK will greet a bright day of national reunification.
					
					 The speakers called for strengthening national defence capability in every way and creating miracles and innovations in the production and construction, true to the new strategic line of the party on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear armed force. 
					
					 They also called upon all the people to unite close around Kim Jong Un and fully demonstrate the dignity and spirit of Songun Korea and thus make contributions to glorifying the significant this year with proud successes in building an economic power. 
					
					 The meetings were followed by demonstration marches.

articles.title: Seminar of Officials and Members of GFTUK Heldã€€
articles.content:
Seminar of Officials and Members of GFTUK Held
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A seminar of the officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) was held at the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday. It is to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 At the seminar the speakers said Kim Jong Il wisely led the overall affairs of the country, holding the important post of the chairman of the NDC.
					
					 During the hardest days of the country he remarkably consolidated the state political structure and firmly defended socialism by pursuing Songun politics and thus opened up a new era of prosperity in the country, they noted, adding:
					
					 He has developed the Korean People's Army, which has tightly held the arms of revolution and class, into the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army strong in the idea of devotedly defending the leader and into invincible combat forces equipped with all modern offensive and defensive means. 
					
					 His noble intention and desire are coming true thanks to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They stressed the need to make great efforts to implement the decision of the recent plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and to glorify this year marking the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of victory in the Fatherland Liberation War as a year of creation and change under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, and its officials and members and workers.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees, Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees, Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were awarded to intellectuals on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They have greatly contributed to pushing forward the building of a thriving nation through dynamic efforts to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology holding high the flame of the industrial revolution in the new century.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Hall of the youth league on Wednesday.
					
					 Professorship was awarded to Ri Jong Hu and Sin Jae Yong, department heads at Kim Chaek University of Technology, Yang Yong Jip, director of an institute of the State Academy of Sciences, and Paek Chon Ho, vice-director of an institute of the academy, and two others.
					
					 Doctor's degree went to Department Heads of Kim Il Sung University Han Yong Chol and Pak Kil Man, teacher of Kim Chaek University of Technology Pak Kum Dol, teacher of the University of Sciences Ri Su Bok, Director of an institute of the State Academy of Sciences O Su Nam, Vice Section Chief at the Korea General Red-Cross Hospital Kang Hung Jun, Director of the North Phyongan Provincial Maternity Hospital Kim Hwa Suk and others and assistant professor's degree to 159 persons.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Ilã€€
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Ri Se Gwang and Kim Jin Hyok who proved successful at the 6th Competition for the Cup for Gymnastic Challengers of the International Gymnastic Federation visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues before paying tribute.
					
					 They were warmly welcomed by citizens upon their return home Wednesday.
					
					 They were interviewed by media persons in Pyongyang at Kim Il Sung Stadium on the same day.
					
					 At the press conference players and coaches vowed to make positive contributions to giving full play to the dignity and might of Songun Korea by bagging gold medals at international games in the future, too.

articles.title: UN Security Council, Marionette of U.S.: News Analyst
articles.content:
UN Security Council, Marionette of U.S.: News Analyst
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists' moves to provoke a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula have gone beyond the danger line and reached the phase of an actual war.
					 The current developments were caused by the unfair "resolutions" cooked up at the United Nations Security Council, which is blindly following the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 The UNSC, whose mission is to deter a war, preserve peace in the world and ensure sovereignty and security of the UN member states, has turned into a marionette of the U.S., inviting condemnation from the international community.
					
					 It has been abused by the U.S. for its moves for aggression so far. This is well evidenced by the Korean War in the 1950s, which the U.S. provoked to invade the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. At that time the UNSC was used to justify the war.
					
					 Even in the 21st century, the U.S. imperialists invaded Iraq, killing many civilians, under the name of the UN. The tragic events taking place in the Middle East and other parts of the world at present are unthinkable apart from the UNSC under the manipulation of the U.S.
					
					 The "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK, recently adopted at the UNSC, were worked out on the initiative of the U.S. This fully revealed again the colors of the UNSC as a marionette of the U.S.
					
					 Such behaviors of the UNSC only give vent to the Korean people's hatred toward it as it is keeping mum about the U.S. arrogant deeds.
					
					 The prevailing situation on the Korean Peninsula calls for putting an end to dominationism of the imperialists that would violate the sovereignty of other countries by abusing some international bodies.
					
					 The all-out action to be conducted by the DPRK people against the U.S. is a final battle against the imperialists and, at the same time, a war of justice for putting an end to the wrong behaviors of UNSC and some other international bodies following the U.S. hegemonic moves.
					
					 The UNSC is advised to come to its senses and ensure impartiality and equality in dealing with global affairs.

articles.title: Stage of Poems and Songs Given by DWUK Members ã€€
articles.content:
Stage of Poems and Songs Given by DWUK Members 
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A stage of poems and songs were given by members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea at the Hall of Women on Wednesday to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Present there were Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union, officials of relevant units and the women's union and union members in the city.
					
					 The performance began with poem "Two Decades of Victory and Glory". Put on the stage were such numbers as chorus "Glory to the General", serial songs "Our Satellite Lifted off to the Sky" and "At a Go", single reciting of poem "Eternal Sun of Songun Korea" and poem "Spring on Arms".
					
					 The performers praised the immortal feats Kim Jong Il performed by honorably defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation under the uplifted banner of the great Songun and ushering in a new history of building a thriving nation on this land.
					
					 They also put on the stage quintets and choruses "Our Leader Beloved by People" and "Ardent Desire" which help look back on the fortune of being blessed with illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 Put on the stage were chorus poem "Korean Women of Songun Make an Oath" and choruses "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives" and "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order".

articles.title: Torch-lighting Ceremony of Int'l Martial Arts Games Heldã€€
articles.content:
Torch-lighting Ceremony of Int'l Martial Arts Games Held
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of lighting the torch of the 5th International Martial Arts Games took place in Pyongyang on Wednesday. 
					 The torch lit at the flame-holder of martial arts games in Chongchun Street here will be conveyed to the flame-holder of the opening ceremony of the 5th International Martial Arts Games to be held in Australia in May. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Ri Jong Gun, secretary general of the International Martial Arts Games Committee, Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, officials concerned, martial arts players, people and school youth and children in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Fritz Wendland, founding president of the World Karate Confederation who is also vice-chairman of the games committee, Li Zonglin, chairman of the Marketing Commission of the games committee, and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made. 
					
					 The speakers expressed the belief that the 5th International Martial Arts Games would develop the international martial arts movement to a new phase and mark an important occasion in contributing to building a peaceful new world. 
					
					 Ri Jong Gun handed over the torch to the torch-carriers. 
					
					 The carriers ran along Chongchun Street.

articles.title: DPRK Strives for Progress in Pomicultureã€€
articles.content:
DPRK Strives for Progress in Pomiculture
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The National Fruit Agency of the DPRK is directing big efforts to creating a number of new orchards and properly managing them.
					 According to an official concerned, dwarf apple orchards in Kosan County, Kangwon Province and Pukchong County, South Hamgyong Province have taken on new looks to meet the requirements of the present-day fruit farming.
					
					 The agency set itself the goal to create new large-size orchards in the areas favorable for pomiculture.
					
					 It is now stepping up the designing of orchards on the basis of deep analysis of its experience and the tendency of development in fruit farming. It also pays deep attention to supplying fruit farms with enough farming materials.
					
					 In order to increase the fertility of soil, the agency took a measure to build production bases of organic fertilizers at all fruit farms.
					
					 Vegetable insecticides have been applied to fruit trees.
					
					 Through demonstration lectures and passing-on-technique meetings, it helps officials and farmers get a rich knowledge of fruit farming.

articles.title: White Porcelain, One of Korea's Cultural Heritages
articles.content:
White Porcelain, One of Korea's Cultural Heritages
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- White porcelain was one of attractions in the Feudal Joson (Korea) Dynasty (1392-1910).
					 Representing the pure-minded Korean people's emotional feelings, white porcelain is divided into snow-colored, milk-colored and light blue-colored ones.
					
					 They were lightly patterned in good harmony with white-color background. The patterns mainly covered flowers, sceneries of mountains and animals.
					
					 Thus, ceramics of the Fedual Joson Dynasty were characterized by the white porcelain while those of the Koryo Dynasty (918-1392) by Koryo celadon, all of which were renowned all over the world.
					
					 Still now, those of the Feudal Joson Dynasty are estimated to be the best among white porcelains in the world.
					
					 The white porcelain of Korea is listed as one of the national cultural heritages.

articles.title: Mt. Paektu Tiger Indigenous to Koreaã€€
articles.content:
Mt. Paektu Tiger Indigenous to Korea
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has paid big efforts to conserving and propagating tigers of Mt. Paektu.
					 The tiger is one of national treasures, which inhabits the area of Samjiyon and Taehongdan counties in Ryanggang Province where Mt. Paektu is situated.
					
					 Kim Kyong Sun, a researcher of the Central Committee of the Nature Conservation Union of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 Tiger is considered to be a symbol of bravery. The tiger of Mt. Paektu indigenous to Korea has been listed as one of rare animals under international protection.
					
					 The grown-up tiger is big with its back yellow brown-colored and stomach and inside of four legs white-colored. 24 black-colored stripes are laid across the back and 5 across the stomach, with 8 ring-shaped patterns on the tail.
					
					 The Paektu Plateau is forested with Abies nesphrolepis, spruce and larch, scattered with rocks and bogs. Living in the area are also various species of animals such as antelope, deer, roe deer, yellow-throated marten, fox and wolf.
					
					 Therefore, it provides good conditions for the tiger to live in.
					
					 Living for about 25 years, Mt. Paektu tiger has a litter of two to four and six to the maximum every two or three years.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Order Is Final Decision to End Showdown with U.S.: Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Order Is Final Decision to End Showdown with U.S.: Newspaper
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un issued an order for action at an operation meeting on the performance of duty of the Strategic Rocket Force of the Korean People's Army on firepower strike. This is the final decision of justice prompted by the matchless grit of the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu to put a definite end to the long-standing history of showdown with the U.S. imperialists and blow up the dens of evils.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The U.S. has persistently sought to realise the strategy for stifling the DPRK by force of arms, while trying to keep the state of confrontation going on in the Korean Peninsula, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. prodded the UN Security Council into cooking up "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK, labeling its satellite launch, a legitimate right of a sovereign state, as a "provocation".  The U.S. is threatening the DPRK with a nuclear war.
					
					 It is the final conclusion drawn by the DPRK that it can neither build a reunified thriving nation nor protect the life and security of the people unless it tides over such grave situation.
					
					 The grudge of the Korean people at the U.S., the sworn enemy, is running high and their patience has gone beyond limitation.
					
					 All the service personnel and people of the DPRK have waited for the time of a final battle for national reunification, pledging revenge on the U.S. for over half a century. They are waiting for the final order of Kim Jong Un, keeping themselves on high alert.
					
					 The aggressors and provocateurs will face a disgraceful ruin in the final battle to be started soon, and the great Korean nation will greet the bright day of national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Reinforcing Troops in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Reinforcing Troops in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The number of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea totaled about 37 000, according to the "2012 report on structure of bases" published by the U.S. Defense Department. This is almost 9 000 more than that agreed between the south Korean puppet forces and the U.S.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined commentary says that this is the manifestation of the sinister intention to pose a military threat to the DPRK and step up pressure on it and provoke a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The huge increase of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea is a product of the conspiracy between the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers aiming at invasion of the DPRK, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. brought the troops for aggression to south Korea to instigate the south Korean puppet forces, engrossed in confrontation with compatriots, to ignite a war of aggression. The puppet forces do not hesitate to stand in the van of provoking a war against the DPRK at the instigation of the U.S.
					
					 The reinforcement of the U.S. troops in south Korea will result in stoking military tension in Northeast Asia and igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 As long as the U.S. imperialist aggressors are allowed to station in south Korea, the danger of a nuclear war can never be removed.
					
					 The DPRK will mercilessly destroy the U.S. troops that have inflicted the pain of national division on the Korean nation for over half a century and are bringing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 When a decisive battle starts, the U.S. troops and military bases in south Korea will become the DPRK's first target.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces should bear in mind the DPRK's last warning.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing New Strategic Line
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing New Strategic Line 
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The March 31 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) set forth the line on carrying on economic construction and building of nuclear armed force simultaneously. This is a strategic line to be always held fast to in order to meet the supreme interests of the Korean revolution. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a by-lined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean people, who have lived being exposed to the constant nuclear threat from the U.S., have waited eagerly for realizing the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula at an early date and providing peaceful circumstances.
					
					  The denuclearization of the peninsula called for by the DPRK was to ensure the peace and defend the sovereignty and security of the nation.
					
					 This was not aimed to put down arms by kneeling down to the U.S. threat to stifle the DPRK and leave to the tender mercy of the U.S. everything of the country including the sovereignty and the right to development.  
					
					 As a consequence, the DPRK was left with no option but to access necessary deterrent.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear blackmail has reached an extreme phase after the DPRK ranked itself among the full-fledged nuclear weapons states.
					
					 The U.S. fabricated the "resolution" at the UN Security Council while branding the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purpose as a "ballistic missile launch". This was the extension and the height of its hostile policy to the DPRK. 
					
					 Under the situation where the U.S. has posed constant nuclear threat to the DPRK, the latter was compelled to hold tight the nuclear weapons and bolster the nuclear armed force both in quality and quantity.
					
					 It is very just for the WPK to set forth the new strategic line on steadily bolstering the nuclear deterrent for self-defense to cope with the U.S. persistent nuclear blackmail against the DPRK, the article concludes.

articles.title: U.S. Is Responsible for Escalated Tension in Korea: Newspaper
articles.content:
U.S. Is Responsible for Escalated Tension in Korea: Newspaper 
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is the chieftain which drove the situation of the Korean Peninsula into the uncontrollable phase, says Minju Joson Wednesday.
					 In a bylined commentary the newspaper goes on:
					
					 The U.S., regarding the Asia-Pacific region as vital to its strategic interests, has intensified military interference in the region. 
					
					 In particular, the U.S. deployed huge armed forces for aggression in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity and persistently pursued the strategy to pressurize the DPRK to militarily stifle it. The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are typical examples. 
					
					 Intentionally escalating the tension of the peninsula, the U.S. took issue with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and the third underground nuclear test for self-defence to realize its ambition for invasion of the DPRK. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. introduced a formation of B-52 strategic bombers from its base on Guam and B-2A stealth strategic bombers from its mainland into the Korean Peninsula to gravely threaten the DPRK with nuclear weapons. 
					
					 The U.S. has waited for a chance to stifle the DPRK for decades. Now its anti-DPRK acts have entered the practical phase. Under this grave situation, the DPRK could not remain a passive on-looker but made an important decision of taking a resolute counteraction to defend its sovereignty and right to existence. 
					
					 The DPRK's option is just and it will unhesitatingly launch a do-or-die battle with the U.S. imperialists as it had already declared, no mater what others say, since it has a powerful might.

articles.title: U.S. Sends Weapons for Preemptive Attack in Vicinity of S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Sends Weapons for Preemptive Attack in Vicinity of S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The U.S. navy sent SBX-1 to waters around south Korea, south Korean KBS reported on April 2.
					 It also sent latest destroyer capable of intercepting missiles in waters around south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers took this step next day when they introduced F-22s into south Korea, blustering that these are aimed to closely monitor the movement of the DPRK and cope with missile launch.
					
					 The U.S. is increasing the danger of war, ceaselessly introducing lots of nuclear war hardware into south Korea and in the vicinity of the Korean Peninsula in a bid to bring dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over Korea.

articles.title: Action for Peace Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Peace Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- People belonging to civic and public organizations of south Korea, including the Solidarity for Progress, Confederation of Trade Unions, Federation of Peasants Associations and Society of April Revolution, and elders of the reunification movement held an urgent meeting at which they called for ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					 At the meeting speakers said that there is no legal and institutional mechanism to deter a war on the peninsula. Nevertheless, the "government" and the ruling party are not making substantial efforts to settle the issue, they charged.
					
					 In order to tide over the present serious crisis, it is necessary for people from different social standings to launch a dynamic action for peace, they held.
					
					 They called for forming "people's action for putting an end to war and realizing peace" involving organizations of all social strata and conducting an action.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Army Incites War Fever
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Army Incites War Fever
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Marine Corps is scheming to stage massive north-targeted war exercises in April, south Korean Yonhap News reported.
					 The First Marine Division was reported to have examined sortie posture for rapid reinforcement in case of contingency and stage a combat drill on Jeju Island and in Phochon, Kyonggi Province.
					
					 It is planning to stage drills for coping with unexpected circumstances and occupying bases at units deployed on islands in the West Sea of Korea close to the DPRK and aerial and naval firing drills in any place anytime.
					
					 The warmongers are scheming to stage landing drill and tactical drill targeting the coastal areas of the DPRK and an actual mobile firing drill of motorized units in league with the U.S. Marines.
					
					 They are seeking to make field tactical discussion by introducing the U.S. Marines being involved in the joint war exercises into units deployed on islands in the West Sea of Korea and forefront units including the Second Marine Division.
					
					 Meanwhile, they designated April as "a month of vowing to win victory in war" and decided to intensify mental education among units of the Marine Corps.
					
					 The commander of the corps sent his message to units to incite war fever and ordered to hang suspension posters in this connection.
					
					 The war moves to ignite a war against the DPRK have reached a grave stage.

articles.title: Organization of Koreans in U.S. Accuses U.S. of Deteriorating Situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Organization of Koreans in U.S. Accuses U.S. of Deteriorating Situation on Korean Peninsula
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued a commentary on Mar. 29, accusing the U.S. of straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 The U.S. let B-2As fly into south Korea on Mar. 28 and stage the drills of striking simulated ground targets in the north.
					
					 The drills brought into bolder relief the bellicose nature of the U.S. seeking to ignite another Korean war.
					
					 It, at the same time, gave the lie to the south Korean regime's oft-repeated assertion that cooperation with the U.S. deters a war and protects the people.
					
					 The U.S. troops should be pulled out of south Korea and any military provocation getting on the DPRK's nerves stopped at once in order to prevent a war.
					
					 The U.S. should understand that its mainland may also turn into a theater of war if a war breaks out in the peninsula and bear in mind the warnings of the DPRK that it would thoroughly annihilate the enemies so that no one might be left to sign the surrender documents.

articles.title: All-People Resistance, Sacred War for Revenge Called for
articles.content:
All-People Resistance, Sacred War for Revenge Called for
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Koreans in China released statements in support of the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army which declared that the DPRK's army and people would demonstrate their will of counteraction with practical military actions.
					 The General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on March 27 said that the U.S. is opening to public the plan to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with kicking up the frantic nuclear war racket targeting it.
					
					 Worse still, the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces blustered that they have hatched plots to dare hurt the monuments to the immortality of the leaders, the supreme symbols of Songun Korea, and worked out even the "list for bringing them down", the statement charged.
					
					 The Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China in a statement on the same day said that it would positively respond to the statement of the KPA Supreme Command which called upon all to turn out in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					
					 The Youth Federation of Korean Nationals in China in a statement on March 28 noted: The south Korean puppet forces faked up the heinous conspiratorial plots again, not content with kicking up the north-targeted nuclear war maneuvers in league with their master U.S. They are the group of traitors who do not want to be fellow countrymen, and rubbish of the nation and human scum who should be thrown away from the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The officials of the federation and all young Koreans in China will turn out in the all-people resistance, the sacred war to resolutely shatter the war moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers and bury the group of traitors, the statement noted.

articles.title: Koreans in China Protest against "Human Rights Resolution" against DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in China Protest against "Human Rights Resolution" against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Youth Federation of Koreans in China issued a statement "We strongly oppose and reject the anti-DPRK 'human rights resolution', a product of political confrontation and conspiracy" on Mar. 25.
					 The U.S. and its allies, out of inveterate repugnance and hostility to the DPRK, have staged the farce of adopting "human rights resolution" against the latter on an annual basis, the statement said, terming it a politically-motivated plot that does not deserve even a passing note.
					
					 To debate about the human rights issue, the UN Human Rights Council should see through the miserable human rights abuses in south Korea first and take issue with the U.S. and the south Korean regime, chieftains who turned south Korea into a tundra of human rights, before any others, it held.
					
					 The Shenyang Branch of the General Association of Koreans in China in its statement on Mar. 28 condemned the south Korean puppet forces for moving to fabricate the "human rights resolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 Saying all the people in the DPRK are leading an equal and happy life under the socialist system centered on popular masses, the statement noted debate on human rights issue in the DPRK is nonsensical by origin.
					
					 Slandering the DPRK's human rights performance just means a wonton challenge to the dignity of the socialist system, it said, adding the army and people of the DPRK will never tolerate it.
					
					 All the Koreans in China will turn out as one to protect the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK which they regard dearer than their lives and to safeguard its socialist system, it stressed.

articles.title: Chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Chairpersons of Chongryon Headquarters Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements respectively on Mar. 29 in support of the statement released by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army which declared that it would demonstrate with the practical military action the resolute will of the army and people of the DPRK to take counteractions against enemies.
					 Hwang Myong, chairman of the Chongryon Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters, fully supported the statement of the KPA Supreme Command indicative of the iron will and ever-victorious stamina of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Pak Jong Song, chairman of the Chongryon Hokkaido Headquarters, referred to the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula where the racket of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK has entered the phase of an actual war, adding this vividly proves that the warmongers' wild ambition for aggression have reached the extremity.
					
					 Pu Yong Uk, chairperson of the Chongryon Osaka Prefectural Headquarters, called upon all Koreans in Japan to turn out as one in the sacred struggle to achieve the country's reunification and prosperity, keeping in mind the unshakable faith that they would win sure victory in the all-out action against the U.S. as long as there is Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Jo Il Yon, chairperson of the Chongryon Saitama Prefectural Headquarters, voiced willingness to turn out in the just great war for national reunification by making every possible effort in the patriotic work true to the leadership of the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Mun Kwang Hui, chairperson of the Chongryon Aichi Prefectural Headquarters, expressed the stand to dynamically turn out in the sacred war to thoroughly shatter the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the pro-U.S. group of traitors to unleash a war of aggression, bearing in mind the great pride in the great Songun politics and the DPRK's nuclear deterrence.
					
					 Ri Yong Sik, chairman of the Chongryon Miyagi Prefectural Headquarters, said that justice and victory are in store for the Korean people who rose up to defend their sovereignty, renewing the will to protect the socialist homeland at any cost, preserve the Chongryon organizations and advance vigorously along the road of victory.
					
					 Ri Ju Hak, chairman of the Chongryon Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters, expressed his will to take an active part in the great war for national reunification and the work to open up a fresh heyday for Chongryon.
					
					 Ro Mu Hyon, chairman of the Chongryon Hyogo Prefectural Headquarters, said that he would firmly struggle, keeping pace with the Korean people in their efforts to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation.
					
					 Ri Kon Nam, chairman of the Chongryon Yamaguchi Prefectural Headquarters, held that now is the time for those who have blood and soul as the Korean nation to resolutely rise up as one in the patriotic struggle for protecting the destiny of the nation.
					
					 Ri Myong Yu, chairperson of the Chongryon Shizuoka Prefectural Headquarters, clarified his will to fight together with the socialist homeland and firmly defend the Chongryon organizations and compatriots' society with an enmity against the U.S. and hostile forces, holding aloft the slogan of "Forward to a final victory!"

articles.title: Chongryon Slams U.S., S. Korean Nuclear War Racket
articles.content:
Chongryon Slams U.S., S. Korean Nuclear War Racket 
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- As regards the fact that the dear respected Kim Jong Un convened an urgent operation meeting on the performance of duty of the Strategic Rocket Force of the Korean People's Army on the firepower strike and made an important decision, the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued a statement on Monday.
					 The important decision made by Kim Jong Un serves as a great declaration of his will to bring about the day of national reunification by putting an end to the history of showdown with the U.S., the statement said.
					
					 It also serves as an ultimatum to anti-reunification hostile forces including the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime and a final decision of justice which reflects the will of the Korean people to annihilate the enemies, the statement added.
					
					 It resolutely denounced the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group of traitors for scheming to inflict a nuclear holocaust upon the Korean nation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The ulterior purpose of the U.S. is to disarm the DPRK by employing all sorts of means and methods, realize its sinister aim to "topple the social system" in the DPRK and thus obliterate the Korean nation, an unpardonable state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once its nuclear war drills and "sanctions" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 The Central Standing Committee of Chongryon calls upon the Japanese and other people in the world to support the just stance of the DPRK, condemn the illegal "resolution on sanctions" of the UN Security Council and oppose the reckless nuclear war racket of the U.S. and its allies.
					
					 The nuclear war to be forced by the U.S. will not be an issue confined to the DPRK and the U.S. only.
					
					 Officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan will join the people in the homeland who rose up as one to safeguard the country's sovereignty and the supreme dignity of the nation and win victory in the great war for national reunification.

articles.title: Koreans Protest against Exclusion of Korean Schools from Tuition-Waiver Program
articles.content:
Koreans Protest against Exclusion of Korean Schools from Tuition-Waiver Program
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- A rally took place in Tokyo on March 31 in protest against the exclusion of Korean schools from the tuition-waiver program for senior high schools.
					 Attending the rally were officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) in Kanto and other areas of Japan, Koreans, teachers and students of Joson University and Korean high schools and Japanese figures, at least 7 500 in all.
					
					 The representative of the Liaison Council against the Exclusion of Korean Schools from the Tuition-Waiver Program for Senior High Schools, Japanese organization, and Japanese of various social standings made speeches.
					
					 The speakers said it is a shameful history of Japan that it deprived Korea of sovereignty, land and written and spoken Korean languages and names early in the 20th century.
					
					 National chauvinism stalks in Japan and there are serious moves to retrogressively revise the Pacifist Constitution in the Japanese Diet, they deplored.
					
					 The first thing the Abe regime did after taking power was the exclusion of Korean schools from the tuition-waiver program, they said, stressing that such an outrageous act should never be tolerated.
					
					 They strongly demanded that the Japanese government apply the tuition-waiver program to Korean schools immediately, and the local autonomous bodies soon resume the payment of aid fund.
					
					 Koreans of all social standings made speeches.
					
					 They pledged to wage an unflinching struggle to defend Korean schools and students.
					
					 A report on the activities for the aid to Korean schools was made at the rally.
					
					 A resolution was adopted.
					
					After the rally, the participants marched along the streets.
					
					 Right-wing gangsters tried to block the march, being backed by the police.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Nepali Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Nepali Paper
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Nepali paper Jana Disa on March 28 carried the detailed gist of President Kim Il Sung's work "Enhancing the Role of the Popular Masses Is the Guarantee for Victory in the Cause of Independence."
					 The work, made public on April 15, Juche 81 (1992), clarifies that the 80-year-long life of Kim Il Sung is a life of struggle devoted to the people as their son and that the Workers' Party of Korea has firmly maintained the Juche-oriented stand and principle, always guided by the Juche idea, in the whole course of the revolution and construction.
					
					 It also indicates that the common task facing the Korean people and world people is to build an independent new world.
					
					 The paper carried a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Pakistan
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in pamphlet by the Karachi Imad Graphic Publishing House of Pakistan on Mar. 26.

articles.title: Serbian Party Supports DPRK's Countermeasures
articles.content:
Serbian Party Supports DPRK's Countermeasures
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The New Yugoslavia Communist Party in Serbia expressed full support for the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The party stated on March 27 as follows:
					
					 The U.S. recently made strategic bombers roar in the sky over south Korea, aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula despite strong protest of the Korean people and the world peace-loving people.
					
					 It is also staging large-scale joint military exercises together with the south Korean puppet forces after working out an operation plan for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 We demand the U.S. immediately withdraw its aggression forces including nuclear weapons from south Korea and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's countermeasures for defending the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of its supreme dignity.
					
					 We call on all the peace-loving people in the world to turn out in the struggle against the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices.

articles.title: Russian Organizations Accuse U.S. of Its Nuclear War Racket
articles.content:
Russian Organizations Accuse U.S. of Its Nuclear War Racket
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Russian organizations made public statements on March 26 and 27 in denunciation of the U.S. imperialists for their undisguised nuclear war racket to stifle the DPRK.
					 The Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said:
					
					 The introduction of U.S. nuclear strategic bombers into the Korean Peninsula is not mere saber-rattling but a grave threat to the security of the planet.
					
					 The United Nations completely lost its qualifications as an international body, being reduced into a tool legalizing the U.S. acts of invading at its will other countries incurring its displeasure.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people, under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, would deal a disgraceful defeat to the arrogant U.S. imperialists and their stooges.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will deal a deadly counterstrike at the U.S. aggressors.
					
					 Only when the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces are withdrawn from south Korea, can peace and security on the Korean Peninsula be ensured.
					
					 The Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea noted:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK armed with the Juche idea and guided by Songun will deal a merciless blow at the aggressors through a-match-for-a hundred actions.
					
					 The DPRK is the invincible fortress of socialism.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists can never evade implacable punishment.

articles.title: DPRK's Strong Will of Counteraction Supported Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Strong Will of Counteraction Supported Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of Russia, Ukraine and Belarus expressed full support for the March 26 statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the March 26 statement of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.
					 The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia in a statement on March 27 expressed great resentment at the U.S. undisguised moves for aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The involvement of nuclear strike means in the joint military drills clearly proves the U.S. ambition to violate the sovereignty of other countries and realize its strategy for world domination, the statement said.
					
					 It held that the nuclear war exercises on the Korean Peninsula can never be tolerated as they are extremely dangerous moves of harassing peace and stability in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia will always stand by the Korean people and fully support the Korean people in their just struggle, the statement added.
					
					 The Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Ukraine-DPRK Association in a joint statement on the same day said that the DPRK will demonstrate its strong will of counteraction with physical military action and thus foil the U.S. moves for a new war and firmly defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 We fully support the resolute countermeasures taken by the army and people of the DPRK to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation, the statement stressed.
					
					 The Belarus Youth Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics Named after February 16 in a statement on the same day appealed to the international community to fully support the principled stand of the DPRK to defend the justice and thus foil the U.S. moves for a new war.

articles.title: Foreign Media Disclose U.S. Hostile Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Media Disclose U.S. Hostile Moves against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and websites of various countries in their articles disclosed the anti-DPRK hostile moves of the U.S. and its allies.
					 The Nepali paper Charcha carried an article titled "Thunder of the DPRK" on Mar. 25. It carried a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The DPRK conducted the third underground nuclear test to cope with the "resolution on sanctions" of the UN Security Council. It was adopted at the instigation of the U.S. which is accusing the former of its application satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The DPRK declared that it would take second and third tougher countermeasures in succession unless the U.S. withdraws its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Posted on the German website DPRK Information on Mar. 18 was an article which said:
					
					 The U.S. is escalating its hostile acts against the DPRK, as evidenced by such moves as putting in practice before any others the "resolution on sanctions". They forced the DPRK to conduct the nuclear test.
					
					 The nuclear test is an eruption of the towering indignation of the Korean people against the hostile act of the U.S. and demonstration of their strong will to protect the sovereignty to the end and of the tremendous national power of the DPRK. 
					
					 The March issue of Dialog, the paper of the Czech Republic, referred to the fact that the UN Security Council fabricated another "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, timed to coincide with the start of the U.S.-south Korea large-scale joint military exercises in south Korea.
					
					 The Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times on March 24 and the U.S. paper Militant on March 25 carried articles supporting the Korean people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty and denouncing the U.S. and its followers for their hostile moves against the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Will Kneel Down before DPRK: Newspaper
articles.content:
U.S. Will Kneel Down before DPRK: Newspaper
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The U.S., which is pursuing a hostile policy toward the DPRK, will perish in the flame kindled by it and kneel down before the army and people of the DPRK that have turned out in an all-out action against the U.S.
					 The Syrian paper Al Nour said this in a commentary on March 27 titled "Korea's nuclear weapons do not pose threat but serve as a might defending peace."
					
					 The DPRK successfully put a satellite into orbit with its own efforts and technology in December last year, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 Information data sent from the satellite are essential for developing agriculture and preventing natural disasters.
					
					 The U.S. and lots of other countries launch and use satellites.
					
					 However, the U.S. and its allies have kicked up a racket, branding the DPRK's satellite launch as a violation of "resolution" of the UN Security Council.
					
					 The U.S. instigated the UN Security Council to fabricate a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK in contravention of the UN Charter.
					
					 The DPRK flatly rejected the "resolution on sanctions" aimed at aggression.
					
					 It has taken resolute countermeasures to cope with the U.S. moves to stifle it.
					
					 It carried out the third underground nuclear test in February this year.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean War Moves Condemned by Nepali Organizations.
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean War Moves Condemned by Nepali Organizations.
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Nepali organizations denounced the provocative joint military exercises of the U.S. and south Korea. They included the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee, Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea, Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea, Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, National Press Club, Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, Study Forum for Self-Reliance, International Committee for the Study of Songun Politics for Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics.
					 The organizations in a joint statement on March 28 said:
					
					 The organizations of Nepal loving justice and peace and working hard to develop the friendly relations with the Korean people express deep concern over the touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants peace on the peninsula, it will have to stop at once the provocative joint military exercises.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces do not stop the provocation against the DPRK, the situation on the peninsula will lead to an unpredictable phase.
					
					 There is a limit to the DPRK's patience.
					
					 We strongly demand the U.S. and south Korean authorities stop at once the war maneuvers on the Korean Peninsula, discontinue the hostile moves against the DPRK and replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty.
					
					 We call upon progressive people and all countries concerned to work hard to ensure durable peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: DPRK Has Legitimate Right to Develop Nukes: Expert
articles.content:
DPRK Has Legitimate Right to Develop Nukes: Expert
						
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Russian internet news agency Baltinfor on March 29 carried an article titled "DPRK has legitimate right to develop nuclear weapons" authored by writer and military historian Sergey Pereslegin.
					 The author said that a touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the ever-mounting moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces to ignite a nuclear war.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK is not a member nation of NPT. So, it has the legitimate right to develop nuclear weapons. It is developing means for delivering nuclear weapons by itself. It is also the right to do so.
					
					 The West is applying sanctions against the DPRK, far from taking neutral approach to such understandable actions.
					
					 In fact, all sanctions have already been slapped on the DPRK, entailing absurd results.
					
					 As an example, all sanctions have been oriented to banning the DPRK from manufacturing nuclear weapons but it has made them despite the sanctions. This has accordingly rendered the sanctions illegitimate.
					
					 As a result, the West had better scrap such absurd sanctions.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Senegal
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Senegal
						
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente del Senegal con motivo del 53o aniversario de la independencia de este pais africano.
					El remitente expone la conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre la RPDC y Senegal se profundizaran y se desarrollaran mas tambien en el futuro y desea al destinatario mayores exitos en las labores responsables para lograr la paz y estabilidad del pais, la unidad nacional y el desarrollo socioeconomico.

articles.title: Mitines de militares y civiles en ciudades coreanas
articles.content:
Mitines de militares y civiles en ciudades coreanas
						
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 3 en las ciudades de Nampho y Rason los mitines de militares y civiles para apoyar la declaracion de la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea y lograr la victoria en el combate final de la resistencia de todo el pueblo contra Estados Unidos, los titeres surcoreanos y otros agresores.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y el Poder, las entidades de masas, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios, trabajadores, profesores y empleados y los estudiantes de las fabricas, empresas, granjas, universidades y las escuelas especializadas de las localidades.
					
					Los oradores destacaron sobre todo que estan dispuestos a tomar la represalia contra los enemigos el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que han recibido la declaracion de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC y la decision importante tomada por el Comandante Supremo del EPC Kim Jong Un en la reunion operacional por el cumplimiento de la mision de fuego de las fuerzas coheteriles estrategicas.
					
					Nuestro pais cuenta con medios y metodos propios de ataque, nunca vistos ni imaginables por el mundo, y todos los blancos militares de los enemigos estan dentro de la mirilla de nuestros medios de ataque de precision, subrayaron.
					
					Dijeron que si el imperialismo norteamericano provoca otra vez en esta tierra la guerra, sufrira la destruccion vergonzosa y el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea acogeran el maravilloso dia de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Exhortaron a centuplicar el poder de defensa nacional y crear milagros e innovaciones en la produccion y la construccion en pleno acato a nueva linea estrategica de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, presentada por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Terminados los mitines, la multitud realizo un desfile.

articles.title: Efectuado seminario de FGSC sobre hazanas de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Efectuado seminario de FGSC sobre hazanas de Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en la Casa Central de Obreros el seminario de funcionarios y gremiales de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC), dedicado al 20o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Los oradores se refrieron a que el Dirigente oriento sabiamente todas las cuestiones del pais asumiendo el importante cargo de Presidente del CDN.
					
					Apuntaron que en los dias dificiles para Corea, el fortalecio mas que nunca el sistema de politico estatal del pais, defendio con firmeza el socialismo y abrio la nueva era de prosperidad en este territorio practicando la politica de Songun.
					
					Fortalecio el EPC como ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, dispuesto a defender a ultranza al lider, la revolucion y la clase, y como filas invencibles con modernos medios de ataque y defensa, recordaron.
					
					Apuntaron que gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, se llevan a la realidad el noble proposito y deseo del Dirigente.
					
					Destacaron la necesidad de dinamizar la lucha por materializar la resolucion aprobada en el pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea siguiendo la guia del Mariscal y glorificar este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC y del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria como el de grandes creaciones y cambios.
					
					En el foro estuvieron presentes el presidente Hyon Sang Ju y otros funcionarios del CC de la FGSC y los obreros y los gremiales.

articles.title: Otorgados a los intelectuales grados academicos
articles.content:
s040319 - Otorgados a los intelectuales grados academicos
						
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (15 de abril) del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fueron otorgados el grado academico o categoria docente a los intelectuales quienes contribuyeron a la construccion de un Estado prospero librando una campana por alcanzar niveles sofisticados bajo la llama de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo.
					La ceremonia de otorgamiento tuvo lugar el dia 3 en la Casa de la Union de la Juventud.
					
					Fue conferida la categoria docente de profesor titular a 6, inclusive los jefes de catedra de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Ri Jong Hu y Sin Jae Yong, al director y al subdirector de instituto de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Yang Yong Jip y Paek Chon Ho.
					
					Ademas, recibieron el titulo de doctor Hyon Yong Chol y Pak Kil Man, jefes de catedra de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Pak Kum Dol, profesor de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Ri Su Bok, profesor de la Universidad de Ciencias Naturales, O Su Nam, director de instituto de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Kang Hung Jun, subjefe de seccion del Hospital Universal de la Cruz Roja de Corea, Kim Hwa Suk, directora de la casa de maternidad de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					
					En tanto, fue entregada la categoria docente de subprofesor titular a 159.
